events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer role and are excited to review your background and experience in development.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on your experience with software development and programming languages.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will be reaching out shortly to discuss the next steps.
The initial screening call was completed successfully where we discussed your technical skills and previous development projects in detail.
Thank you for your prompt response and providing additional information about your experience in software engineering, it was very helpful.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our senior developers to evaluate your coding and system design skills.
Your technical interview went well and our engineering team was impressed with your problem-solving abilities and coding expertise.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your fit within the company culture and go over compensation and benefits details.
You completed the HR interview with positive feedback regarding your alignment with company values and career aspirations.
A job offer was proposed to you outlining the role, salary package, and benefits, indicating our strong interest in having you join our engineering team.
We received your positive feedback expressing enthusiasm and acceptance of the proposed offer to join as a software engineer.
You have officially accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you to the engineering team starting soon.
Your onboarding process has started with orientation sessions and setting up your development environment for your role.
The hiring process is now completed successfully, and your profile is fully onboarded in the engineering department records.
